item.title: 科學寫作的三階梯
item.description: （一般大眾）知道好 （入門人士）操作好 （專業人士）應用好 很多科學觀念，一般外行人是不知道的。所以需要告訴他們，這些東西哪裡好。知道很好之後，怎

item.title: R 4.1.0 new features
item.description: Native pipe # R 4.1.0 rnorm(100, mean = 4, sd = 1) |> density() |> plot() Short anonymous function F1 <- \(x) x^2 + 2*x + 1 class(F1) ## [1] "function" Deriv::Deriv(F1) ## function (x) ## 2 + 2 * x curve(F1) Amazing operation mtcars |> subset(cyl == 4) |> {\(d) lm(mpg ~ disp, data = d)}() ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = mpg ~ disp, data = d) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) disp ## 40.

item.title: 如何用 blogdown 建立個人網站？
item.description: [1 使用 R 套件 blogdown] [2 建立 Github repo] [3 部署到 Netlify] [4 其他調整議題] 1 使用 R 套件 blogdown 1.1 blogdown 1.2 new_site 1.3 install_theme（from hugo） 2 建立 Github repo 2.2 3 部署到

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This sample post is mainly for blogdown users. If you do not use blogdown, you can skip the first section. 1. Markdown or R Markdown This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc.
